tool_description: List of brightest stars and their details.
title: Brightest Stars

api_list.name: Get all brightest stars list
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a list of all the brightest stars that are currently discovered.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brightest-stars.p.rapidapi.com/{param}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brightest-stars.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
